title: arputa cirpiyaDi
sahitya:
arputa cirpiyaDi en ANDavan ain-tozhizhALiyaDi


anupallavi

  cirparam jyOti avan cinmaya nAthanavan cintaik-kanavinAl ciruTTit-tozhil sheyyum


caraNam    uraiyinrip-pan mozhi ulaviDak-kavi sheivAn uLiyinrit-tuLiyilE uyir urup-pala sheivAn
karaiyinri iDamellAm kanavugaLai neivAn kaNNanukkum karuttum karand-urai aruL meyyAn
